Action.Name: Frames.ConstrainHorBar
Action.Description: This sets the maximun movement of the specified horizontal bar.

Arg.Name: Object
Arg.Description: The name of the object serving as the horizontal bar.

Arg.Name: Closest to Top
Arg.Description: The closest the horizontal bar is allowed to get to the top of the application window.

Arg.Name: Closest to Bottom
Arg.Description: The closest the horizontal bar is allowed to get to the bottom of the application window.

Action.Name: Frames.ConstrainVerBar
Action.Description: This sets the maximun movement of the specified vertical bar.

Arg.Name: Object
Arg.Description: The name of the object serving as the vertical bar.

Arg.Name: Closest to Left
Arg.Description: The closest the vertical bar is allowed to get to the left of the application window.

Arg.Name: Closest to Right
Arg.Description: The closest the vertical bar is allowed to get to the right of the application window.

Action.Name: Frames.Initialize
Action.Description: This enables the designated objects as frame bars. This action should be placed in your On Preload or On Show events. Be sure to use this after any change in name prefixes.

Action.Name: Frames.SetHorPrefix
Action.Description: Set the name prefix that horizontal bars will use. To designate a bar or non-moving object, simply name the specified object the proper prefix plus a given suffix (as its name).

Arg.Name: Prefix
Arg.Description: The prefix that will be on all horizontal bar objects. If you do not set this or if an error occurs, the default "hsplit_" will be used as the prefix. This is not case sensitive.

Action.Name: Frames.SetNoMovePrefix
Action.Description: Set the name prefix that non-moving objects will use. To designate a bar or non-moving object, simply name the specified object the proper prefix plus a given suffix (as its name).

Arg.Name: Prefix
Arg.Description: The prefix that will be on all non-moving objects. If you do not set this or if an error occurs, the default "nomove_" will be used as the prefix. This is not case sensitive.

Action.Name: Frames.SetVerPrefix
Action.Description: Set the name prefix that vertical bars will use. To designate a bar or non-moving object, simply name the specified object the proper prefix plus a given suffix (as its name).

Arg.Name: Prefix
Arg.Description: The prefix that will be on all vertical bar objects. If you do not set this or if an error occurs, the default "vsplit_" will be used as the prefix. This is not case sensitive.

Action.Name: Frames.OnMouseButton
Action.Description: This must be placed in your page's On Mouse Button event.

Arg.Name: e_Type
Arg.Description: Do Not Change.

Arg.Name: e_X
Arg.Description: Do Not Change.

Arg.Name: e_Y
Arg.Description: Do Not Change.

Action.Name: Frames.OnMouseMove
Action.Description: This must be placed in your page's On Mouse Move event.

Arg.Name: e_X
Arg.Description: Do Not Change.

Arg.Name: e_Y
Arg.Description: Do Not Change.

Arg.Name: Callback Function
Arg.Description: You may specify a function that will be executed when the splitter bars are being moved. If you do not wish to declare a function then leave nil.

Action.Name: Frames.OnSize
Action.Description: This must be placed in your page's On Size event.

Arg.Name: Window Width
Arg.Description: Do Not Change.

Arg.Name: Window Height
Arg.Description: Do Not Change.

Arg.Name: Page Width
Arg.Description: Do Not Change.

Arg.Name: Page Height
Arg.Description: Do Not Change.

Arg.Name: Object Type
Arg.Description: Do Not Change.

Extended.Name: Frames
Extended.Description:
This plugin adds the ability to create Frames on in your AMS project.
Original Code created by Worm All Additional code created by Centauri Soldier Converted to plugin format by Centauri Soldier
Extended.Author: Centauri Soldier
Extended.InstallNotes: Place the "Frames" folder inside your "AutoPlay Media Studio\Plugins\Actions" folder.
